name: Cattails Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the full Cattails Original Soundtrack by Tormod Garvin.
45 minutes of happy, kitty-inspired music!

Tracks Included:

  • Main Theme - 2 min
  • Summer 1 - 2 min
  • Summer 2 - 2 min
  • Summer 3 - 2 min
  • Autumn 1 - 2 min
  • Autumn 2 - 2 min
  • Autumn 3 - 2 min
  • Winter 1 - 2 min
  • Winter 2 - 2 min
  • Winter 3 - 2 min
  • Spring 1 - 2 min
  • Spring 2 - 2 min
  • Spring 3 - 2 min
  • Playful Cutscene - 1 min
  • Nostalgia Theme - 1 min
  • Hallowed Theme - 1 min
  • Battle Theme - 1 min
  • Credits Theme - 2 min
  • Love Theme - 2 min
  • Mining Theme - 2 min
  • Mining Theme 2 - 2 min
  • Festive Theme, Spring - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Summer - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Autumn - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Winter - 1 min
  • Mystic Theme - 1 min
  • Mole Brothers Theme - 1 min
  • Training Theme - 1 min
  • Total: 45 min
